column6: In the aftermath of the inter-dimensional rift caused by Spider-Man & Doctor Strange's battle with Dormammu, a sorceress of limitless power is set free from years of captivity ... and sets forth on a quest through Manhattan to properly thank the one responsible for it: Spider-Man. And if that weren't bad enough, guess who's on her trail? LOKI... 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.25
column8: | writer:Fiona Avery | inker:Scott Hanna | penciller (cover):John Romita JR.
